response.overview: In March 2020 I was Making a Movie Called "Beast Mode" when this insane virus came to our country. Everything Shut Down, Movie theaters restaurants, Disney World Universal Studios, Busch Gardens, it was crazy. They Didn't want you to go anywhere I kept busy by making the first COVID movie called "The Craiglon Incident" all my actors were shot from 6 feet away. People from around the world sent me their footage to safely make the trilogy. This feature documents that time and the struggles we faced.
response.title: When COVID Came to Town
